name: Dinari PPLT
description: The Dinari PPLT dShares token (PPLT.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the abrdn Physical Platinum Shares ETF (NYSE Arca: PPLT). This exchange-traded fund aims to reflect the performance of the price of physical platinum, less the Trust's expenses. Each PPLT.d token is fully backed by a corresponding PPLT ETF share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, PPLT.d provides investors with exposure to the platinum market through a regulated financial product, offering benefits such as 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
